text: Be Dear to Me is a 1957 Danish family drama movie directed by Annelise Hovmand and starring Eva Cohn, Lily Weiding, Hans Kurt, JÃ¸rgen Reenberg, Annelise Jacobsen, Johannes Marott, Gerda Madsen, Mimi Heinrich. ==Other websites== * Category:1957 drama movies Category:1950s family movies Category:Danish drama movies Category:Movies directed by Annelise Hovmand
